data.text:
@CDPHE Letter to Anonymous:

https://t.co/l6gS9Asu2b

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous
.
.
.
.
Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.
@Jennyoddlady @CDPHE After reading the latest data release from from Pfizer... the answer will continue to be a very firm... no. Never. Not allowing this poison in my body.
@URRIGHT2000 @CDPHE No. You've normalized selfishness & nearly 1 million dead Americans.

@DrayrokShoah So what the actual Covid death rate in children? Why would I vaxx my kid who has zero chance of saying from Covid when there is no long term testing?

Don't need to wear a tinfoil hat to understand reality.
@kilwaaa1 Take off your tin foil hat. Lol. It’s hurting you.
@CDPHE Please, before vaccinating a ~0% risk group, do research to understand the trial endpoints and you’ll see what complete fraud these trials have been.
